name: Kiriko (Overwatch) LORA
description:
This LORA has been trained on 106 images tagged with kiriko (overwatch) from Danbooru.

To generate most of her features coherently, you need to tag them. Primary tags include kiriko \(overwatch\), green hair, ponytail, facial mark, fox mask, half mask and to get her default clothes I usually use white kimono, red skirt. Sometimes hair between eyes helps as well. headgear in negatives helps to remove her fox mask.

Imparts a more solid-lined style when strength is high. Best strength which maintains her features seems to be 0.6-0.8. Hands also seem to tend to be a bit more messed up than usual.

Trained on Anything V4.5. Samples generated using AnyPastel.

modelVersions.name: v1
modelVersions.description: Trained for 20 epochs, 5 repeats per epoch. Learning rate 1e-4 on cosine scheduler.
